I'm afraid it's not close This is the latest thing I've been working on:

What you're looking at (L-R) is a class-E rock in LKO, the "control tower" for a completely awesome space station I want to build onto said rock, the Kranefly asteroid hauler docked to the control tower and being used as a tugship (the tower has no means of propulsion), and the discarded boosters that got the tower to this point.

Like the song says, it's a year until Hummlebee gets to Kerbin SOI and I would not want to give the impression that Kerfleet has been idle in that time--so I have to build this awesome station before I timewarp to Ch.6. However I am fighting the Kraken with both hands. Right after I took this screenshot something took the asteroid in its tentacles and flung it at 1800m/s away from the ships. So I have a persistence file to edit... anyway had to manage this before I got to work, so I missed the window this morning to do Bill's interlude. Will do my best to have something later on today, because I do want to start Ch6 on or before the weekend.

Platforms need a little re-think though, I started putting some together in the VAB and they would have to be huge just to fit a Gliido or Pogo.

Idea is that one or two platforms would dock to the tower with the edge nearly flush against the asteroid. Each would be illuminated by the light from the tower and viewable from the cupolas.
